title: SC justice tenure frees political pressure

content.question: Supreme Court justices were given tenure subject to good behavior by the framers of the Constitution in order to ensure that

choices.label: justices are free from direct political pressures
justices remain accountable to the public
justices are encouraged to make politically popular decisions
cooperation between the judicial and legislative branches is assured
Presidents are encouraged to seek younger nominees for the Supreme Court

content.answer: justices are free from direct political pressures

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
